r.s: High Performance Programmatic Server for PHP with Async IO, Coroutines and Fibers
r.d: Build high-performance, scalable, concurrent TCP, UDP, Unix Socket, HTTP, WebSocket services with PHP and easy to use coroutine, fibers API.
r.n: - New feature: Co::select, the non-blocking coroutine channel selector - New feature: HTTP2 SSE server-sent events - New feature: Improved channel stats - Bug fixed: Argument data type fixed at sleep() and usleep() API by @Hailong - Bug fixed: HTTP2 and TLS bug fixes
